prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Synth Pad, Guitar, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features a combination of Drums, Synth Pad, and Guitar, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This song is comprised of Drums, Synth Pad, and Guitar, but Piano is absent.

Style 3:
This composition has Drums, Synth Pad, and Guitar, but Piano is not included.
